summary: This document is a brief internal communication regarding inmate Jeffrey Epstein's status at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, noting he is being taken off Psych Observation and needs to be housed with an appropriate cellmate. It is dated July 30, 2019, two days before his death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Identified as inmate #76318-054 who is being taken off Psych Observation and needs appropriate cellmate housing.

events.title: Epstein removed from Psych Observation
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein is taken off Psych Observation status and requires housing with an appropriate cellmate.

keyFacts: The document is dated July 30, 2019, two days before Jeffrey Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
Epstein (inmate #76318-054) was being taken off Psych Observation status.
The communication indicates a need to house Epstein with an appropriate cellmate following the change in his observation status.
